mim.author: EAB/FLA/JG Marten Sahlen
mim.name: Sigcomp
mim.description: This MIM describes the CMCO node, specifically the SigComp application Configuration Management (CM) interface.

derivedDataType.name: SigCompTypeDT
derivedDataType.description: EcimDerivedString with length (0..15) constrain and pattern restiction (Stateless|Basic|Dynamic|Shared|USD_EXT|USD_EXT_DYN).

derivedDataType.name: SigCompAlgorithmDT
derivedDataType.description: EcimDerivedString with length (0..15) constrain and pattern restriction (LZBS|LZBS_8K|Deflate|DUAL_LZBS).

class.name: SigComp-Subsystem
class.description: The SigComp Managed Object (MO) represents the top level of the SigComp-Subsystem.
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert test='( (@sigCompCompressionAlgorithm eq "DUAL_LZBS" and @sigCompCompressionType eq "USD_EXT_DYN") or (@sigCompCompressionAlgorithm ne "DUAL_LZBS" and @sigCompCompressionType ne "USD_EXT_DYN") ) '>[Rule SIGCOMP1] Wrong combination of CompressionAlgorithm/CompressionType: USD_EXT_DYN can only be configured with DUAL_LZBS</assert> <assert test='( ((@sigCompCompressionType eq "USD_EXT") and (@sigCompCompressionAlgorithm eq "LZBS" or @sigCompCompressionAlgorithm eq "LZBS_8K")) or ((@sigCompCompressionType ne "USD_EXT") and (@sigCompCompressionAlgorithm ne "LZBS" or @sigCompCompressionAlgorithm ne "LZBS_8K")))'>[Rule SIGCOMP2] Wrong combination of CompressionAlgorithm/CompressionType: USD_EXT can only be configured with LZBS or LZBS_8K</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: sigCompCompressionAlgorithm
attribute.description:
Specifies Compression Algorithm.
Allowed Combinations of Compression Algorithms andTypes: Algorithm - Types LZBS - Basic, Stateless, Dynamic, Shared, USD_EXT LZBS_8k - Basic, Stateless, Dynamic, Shared, USD_EXT Deflate - Basic, Stateless, Dynamic, Shared Dual_LZBS - USD_EXT_DYN

attribute.name: sigCompCompressionType
attribute.description:
Specifies Compression Type.
Allowed Combinations of Compression Types and Algorithms: Types - Algorithm Basic - LZBS, LZBS_8k, Deflate Stateless - LZBS, LZBS_8k, Deflate Dynamic - LZBS, LZBS_8k, Deflate Shared - LZBS, LZBS_8k, Deflate USD_EXT - LZBS, LZBS_8k USD_EXT_DYN - Dual_LZBS

attribute.name: applicationName
attribute.description: The name of the application. The attribute name and value of is used in the applications RDN.
